title: wine_Nicolaysen_Family_Vineyards_2001_Late_Harvest_Alisos_Vineyard_Gewürztraminer_(Santa_Barbara_County)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 109416.
country: US.
description: At nearly 10 years of age, this beautiful Gewürz shows how well a good California dessert wine can age. It's still brisk in clean acidity, but is honeyed and sweet, with nearly 19% residual sugar. Shows rich, exotic pineapple, tangerine marmalade, gingerbread, apricot jam, buttered toast, crème brûlée, vanilla cream and spice flavors, leading to a long, deliriously delicious finish. A heady, flamboyantly sweet wine to drink now..
designation: Late Harvest Alisos Vineyard.
points: 95.
price: 50.0.
province: California.
region_1: Santa Barbara County.
region_2: Central Coast.
